doc: The pathname to the SDF file containing the chemical system to work with.
The pathname to the file where to print the results.
Specifies how to create atom labels. Available options are 'ElementBased' (e.g., 'C1', 'C2', 'H1', 'H2') and 'IndexBased' (e.g., 'C1', 'C2', 'H4', 'H4').
Specifies whether to use 0-based (default) or 1-based indexing.
Specifies a separator to use between labels when reporting the list of labels in output file and log.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
